title: Bock auf heute Nacht .. XD? Best draven ultimate at end of 2k18 watch my clip !

embed.description: Welcome to Raaaaidon's channel on Twitch. Watch them stream League of Legends and other content live and join the community!

body:
Greetings,

[Diamond 3] [Draven OTP] [Sense of humour with alot of fun] [Ger/Eng]

Today I´m doing an night stream which starts at 23:30, so you are all welcome. We will try to get back to diamond 2 so yes. 
Good music, good vibes and we may spray some saltyness XD.

So see you guys and thank you for taking a look, maybe u will like it haha. And I will try to put some good clip moments with draven :D.

replies.body: Greetings, doing some SoloQ till 18:00 German time and then some scrims with my team.
